I was wandering in this area and spotted the name of this place.  I remembered in my travel book so I went directly in.  It was my first time in Spain, first time in Barcelona, first time eating tapas IN SPAIN.  I did not know what I was doing only knowing what I saw on travel/ food TV.  Uh hi, first time, what should I get?!  I stood at the counter and started pointing at things I must have - cava, jamon, artichokes, bacalao, red bell peppers, longostines!  Knowing how good it was looking back, I wish I had ordered more!!  This is definitely one to bookmark for the next time.  Getting the attention of the servers was a little challenging as they are very busy but you just have to step it up for what you want!
